message.body: Ill be in philly tonight! Raleigh and I are just leaving now and the roads are bad. I'm feeling like eating dinner at sardine
Cool well I'll be around. The roads are fine down here so far. Not even drizzling. Give me a call if you wanna hang.
Also, happy birthday. That's the first and only time ill say it tonight.
So I'm at jess k's with scott and melissa and Eric. We might just chill here and order Chinese. Feel like coming over?!
Maybe. I'm kinda relaxing right now. Had a pretty shitty day at work.
Ok well let me know if you go anywhere
I have an early flight so I'm not sure how much longer ill last but I'd love to see you
I understand. I just got stuck doing some favors right now so I'll keep in touch.
Kinda looking at an origami documentary but mostly just chatting with the crew
